info.title: Sao v1
info.description: Exposes CMS platform entry and score resources

get.description: List the Results delimited and grouped by contest, task, entry or user identifier
Get complete Entry Draft Result data for the given entry and testcase ID.
List the entry drafts without their sources.
Get the complete Entry Draft metadata (excluding the associated sources) for the given ID
List the ranked entries without their sources.
Get the complete entry metadata (excluding the associated sources) for the given ID
List the Results delimited and grouped by contest, task, entry or user identifier
Get complete Entry Result data for the given entry and testcase ID.

post.description: Orchestrates the resource creation related to a entry draft submit process (Draft and Result).

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Any source code or input that should be compiled, executed or evaluated

post.description: Orchestrates the resource creation related to a entry submit process (Entry, Token, Result and Score).

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Any source code or input that should be compiled, executed or evaluated

get.description: List scores and its total grouped and filter by contest, task or user

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting order based on score value

ComJossemargtSaoDraftFull.title: Mediatype identifier: application/vnd.com.jossemargt.sao.draft+json; view=full

contestID.description: Contest ID where this Entry has been submitted

contestSlug.description: Contest unique and human readable string identifier

href.description: API href for making requests on the entry

language.description:
Identifies the programming language used in the entry's content. The special keyword "none" should be used 
		instead when submitting plain text, which are used for user test inputs and  diff based grading

taskID.description: Task ID where this Entry has been submitted

taskSlug.description: Task unique and human readable string identifier

userID.description: User ID of the Entry's owner

ComJossemargtSaoEntry.title: Mediatype identifier: application/vnd.com.jossemargt.sao.entry+json; view=default

contestSlug.description: Contest unique and human readable string identifier

href.description: API href for making requests on the entry

taskSlug.description: Task unique and human readable string identifier

token.description:
Identifies when an Entry has been processed using a CMS Entry Token. The default value is true, in other words 
		any submitted Entry will use a CMS Token

stdout.example: Nihil adipisci exercitationem veniam labore et minima.

wallClockTime.description: The spent execution human perceived time

CompilationResult.description: Embedded representation of an entry compilation result

example.stdout: Nihil adipisci exercitationem veniam labore et minima.

EntryPayload.title: EntryPayload

contestSlug.description: Contest unique and human readable string identifier

sources.description: Source files representation. Within this list the source code files and input files can be sent alike.

taskSlug.description: Task unique and human readable string identifier

token.description:
Identifies when an Entry has been processed using a CMS Entry Token. The default value is true, in other words 
		any submitted Entry will use a CMS Token

EntryPayload.description: Any source code or input that should be compiled, executed or evaluated

EntrySource.title: EntrySource

language.description:
Identifies the programming language used in the entry's content. The special keyword "none" should be used 
		instead when submitting plain text, which are used for user test inputs and  diff based grading

name.description:
Source file name including its extension. This field's value should comply with the name format constraint 
		declared by the task resource. Taking the "batch.%l" format as example, the valid source code file names could 
		be "batch.py", "batch.cpp" or "batch.js"

EntrySource.description: Entry's embed type which represents a source file

EvaluationResult.title: EvaluationResult
EvaluationResult.description: Embedded representation of an entry evaluation result

ExecutionResult.title: ExecutionResult

output.example: Ipsam in et sunt eaque sint.

wallClockTime.description: The spent execution human perceived time

ExecutionResult.description: Embedded representation of an entry execution result

example.output: Ipsam in et sunt eaque sint.

ScoreResult.title: ScoreResult

contestValue.description: The graded value relative to the Contest score

taskValue.description: The graded value relative to the Task score

ScoreResult.description: Embedded representation of the entry's scoring after being evaluated

code.description: an application-specific error code, expressed as a string value.

detail.description: a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: Value of ID must be an integer

id.description: a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

meta.description: a meta object containing non-standard meta-information about the error.

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value.

example.detail: Value of ID must be an integer
